title: The Writer's Almanac for Saturday, February 12, 2022
description: Judy Blume, who for decades has written memorable and provoking books for young people (and a few for adults), celebrates 84 years on earth today.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Judy Blume, who for decades has written memorable and provoking books for young people (and a few for adults), celebrates 84 years on earth today.
itunes:summary: Judy Blume, who for decades has written memorable and provoking books for young people (and a few for adults), celebrates 84 years on earth today.
